Sentencas: Clear utilization of low-concentration coal-bed gas (LC-CBG) would save energy, mitigate greenhouse gas emissions, and reduce explosion accidents during a coal-mining process.
Titulo: Direct Power Generation from Low Concentration Coal-Bed Gas by a Catalyst-Modified Solid Oxide Fuel Cell

Sentencas: In this paper, a novel catalyst Ni/BaO/CeO2 (NBC) is developed for CH4 partial oxidation and is used as an independent catalyst layer of a Ni cermet anode.
Titulo: Direct Power Generation from Low Concentration Coal-Bed Gas by a Catalyst-Modified Solid Oxide Fuel Cell

Sentencas: LC-CBG with composition of 30% methane and 70% air is directly fed to the catalyst-modified SOFC to generate electricity.
Titulo: Direct Power Generation from Low Concentration Coal-Bed Gas by a Catalyst-Modified Solid Oxide Fuel Cell

Sentencas: Operated on 30% LC-CBG, the NBC-modified cell shows better performance and discharge stability than the conventional cell without the catalyst layer.
Titulo: Direct Power Generation from Low Concentration Coal-Bed Gas by a Catalyst-Modified Solid Oxide Fuel Cell

Sentencas: Gas chromatography (GC) analysis on effluent gases extracted from the operating catalyst-modified cells also indicates a higher CH4 conversion when the cell is fed with 30% LC-CBG than when fed with 3% H2O-humidified methane.
Titulo: Direct Power Generation from Low Concentration Coal-Bed Gas by a Catalyst-Modified Solid Oxide Fuel Cell

Sentencas: Post-mortem microstructures of cell surface were analyzed.
Titulo: Direct Power Generation from Low Concentration Coal-Bed Gas by a Catalyst-Modified Solid Oxide Fuel Cell

Sentencas: The NBC-modified cell has a potential application for fuels containing low concentration methane and air.
Titulo: Direct Power Generation from Low Concentration Coal-Bed Gas by a Catalyst-Modified Solid Oxide Fuel Cell
